sentences.sContent: Severe migraines can be treated with a drug that constricts the blood vessels.
sentences.sCn: 严重偏头痛可以用一种收缩血管的药物来治疗。

words.tran: 紧缩的；束紧的；压缩性的
收缩；压缩；紧窄感；压缩物
大蟒；括约肌；使压缩之物

trans.tranOther: If a part of your body, especially your throat, is constricted or if it constricts, something causes it to become narrower
